title: The Shattered Lands
body: Long ago, the continent was fractured by a cataclysmic event. Now, the Shattered Lands are a patchwork of realms, each with its own rulers, mysteries, and dangers.

title: Archsage Lyra
body: Lyra is the last living member of the ancient order of Sages. She guards secrets of the old world and guides those who seek to heal the land.

title: Central Wastes
body: Once fertile, now a barren expanse haunted by echoes of the cataclysm. Many adventurers seek lost relics here, few return.
